review: Easy to use. I like that I can move it around to different TVs in the house.
author: Jaime Sublett

review: Exceeded my expectations, price point , ease of use, access speed , etc.  better than Roku, plan to get another one.
author: alexander peterson

review: Fire stick worked the best of any of these devices (that is after I spent two weeks straightening out the fact that I ALREADY HAD amazon prime and they tried to make me susbscribe again (In case you don't know,people, this device was INVENTED TO SELL AMAZON PRIME - ITS NOT MUCH GOOD WITHOUT IT)
author: PDS

review: I am very happy with my Fire TV Stick. It was easy to install,l once I picked the correct language. My first accidental pick was German. Since I am American (no German blood), it took me a couple of tries to get back and get the correct language. After that, install was a snap even for me with little or no tech experience.
author: Happy Person "Red Rock Woman"

review: I absolutely love my fire stick!! I just moved into my first apartment and this was exactly what I was looking for. I use it for Netflix and Hulu mostly. I definitely recommend it!!
author: Sarah Wheeler

review: this little stick opens up a huge world of viewing opportunities , and it was super easy to install! I'm not the most tech savvy, but I had it installed in under 15 minutes. I definitely recommend it!
author: Kika "Kika"
